page_content:
Lancaster Colony Corporation 7
Company Profile
GENERAL
Lancaster Colony Corporation (“Lancaster Colony”, “LANC”,” Company” or “We”) an 
Ohio corporation, is a manufacturer and marketer of specialty food products for the retail 
and foodservice channels. Our brands include Marzetti®, New York BRAND  Bakery® and 
Sister Schubert’s®. Our principal executive offices are located at 380 Polaris Parkway, 
Suite 400, Westerville, OH 43082, and our telephone number is 614-224-7141.
